name: Solar System Game
description:
-CONTROLS

"Q" Time warp speed increase

"E" Time warp speed reset

"X" Explode the sun

"ESC" Open kind of good pause menu

Published Date (5/29/21):

  1. Base game not much

  3. Added the ability to explode the sun
